channel.title: Food Delivery on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Food Delivery on FinanClub

item.title: 1025 DASH
item.description: score:1025 Chances: DoorDash reported record delivery orders and revenue in the second quarter, showing consumers’ commitment to takeout despite rising prices. Strong demand for food and household essentials led to higher spending on the delivery of these items, prompting DoorDash to raise its full-year guidance.

item.title: 1068 GRAB
item.description: score:1068 Chances: Grab plans to announce its unaudited second quarter 2023 results, indicating potential updates on the company’s financial performance. Grab’s strategic reorganization to manage costs and offer more affordable services could signal efforts to adapt to the business environment and enhance long-term sustainability.
